metadata.title: CVE-2017-17042 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
lib/yard/core_ext/file.rb in the server in YARD before 0.9.11 does not block relative paths with an initial ../ sequence, which allows attackers to conduct directory traversal attacks and read arbitrary files.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-17042` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

yard - 0.9.12-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: yard package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.12-2').
